Name: Carrots and Cream
About the game: An interactive meditation on the violence of nature and nutrition. Experience a wordless, poetic, and unsettling story of cooking and gardening in a series of point-and-click vignettes. Features: About 5 minutes of intense carrot interaction. More than enough for most! Natural carrot sounds and otherworldly ambience! Several achievements! Secret alternative ending!
